Content: First Semester runs from Oct 27 2025 to Feb 13 2026. Second Semester is Feb 14 2026 to June 21 2026. WASSCE dates are April 20 to June 20 2026.
First Semester is Jan 5 2026 to April 17 2026. Second Semester is May 18 2026 to Sept 4 2026.
